org.apache.hadoop.tools

Class DistCpOptions.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.tools.DistCpOptions.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DistCpOptions

    public static class DistCpOptions.Builder
extends Object
    The builder of the DistCpOptions. This is designed to be the only public interface to create a DistCpOptions object for users. It follows a simple Builder design pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public DistCpOptions build()
        This is the single entry point for constructing DistCpOptions objects. Before a new DistCpOptions object is returned, it will set the dependent options, validate the option combinations. After constructing, the DistCpOptions instance is immutable.
